update.description: Création de la table de gestion des enquetes
update.requete: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `enquetes` ( `id_enquete` int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, `id_trigger` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `date_debut` datetime NOT NULL, `date_fin` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id_enquete`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
